entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student who has a mixed background of being half Muggle and half witch. This is mentioned in the text as 'I'm half and half'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Seamus and Neville, and he asks Neville about his background.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who has a mixed background of being half Muggle and half witch. This is mentioned in the text as 'Well, my gran brought me up and she's a witch'.

entities.name: algie
entities.description: Algie is Neville's great-uncle who tries to catch Neville off guard and force magic out of him. This is mentioned in the text as 'Great-uncle Algie kept trying to catch me off my guard'.

entities.name: enid
entities.description: Enid is Neville's great-aunt who offers a meringue to Algie and accidentally lets go of Neville. This is mentioned in the text as 'Great-auntie Enid offered him a meringue'.

entities.name: seamus's dad
entities.description: Seamus's dad is a Muggle who was surprised to find out that his wife was a witch. This is mentioned in the text as 'Me dad's a Muggle. Mam didn't tell him she was a witch'.

relationships.description: Algie tried to force magic out of Neville by pushing him off the end of Blackpool pier. This is mentioned in the text as 'Great-uncle Algie kept trying to catch me off my guard and force some magic out of me'.
